description.en: BPAY is a online payment solution for the Australian market which allows consumers to easily initiate payments by using their checking or savings account or linked debit card.
Tesco Lotus allows Thai shoppers to pay offline for their online purchases.
BIG C is a payment solution in Thailand that allows consumers to pay by cash or credit card for their online grocery purchases.
The SEPA Direct Debit enables to make pan-European collections in euro's on a one-off or recurrent basis.

ELV stands for Elektronisches Lastschriftverfahren and is a popular online payment method in Germany. By choosing to pay with ELV at checkout, the consumer permits the merchant to collect (debit) the purchase amount directly from his or her bank account.
Bradesco Comércio Eletrônico is the online bank transfer payment solution of Bradesco, one of the leading banks in Brazil.
eNETS Direct Debit allows shoppers to pay from their secure internet banking application.

SafetyPay is a global, secure Internet payment solution that enables online banking customers to make online purchases from merchants worldwide and pay directly through their local bank account in their local currency.
OTP Bank enables its banking clients to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
Euteller is a privately held payment service provider enabling consumers to make direct payment using online bank account.
POP Pankki enables their customers to use online banking to complete online purchases. Consumers are redirected to their trusted bank environment to initiate a bank transfer.
Komercni Banka (Czech Republic) enables its online shoppers to pay for goods and services using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
Krungthai Bank netbanking allows its banking customers to use its internet banking application for online purchases.
SCB Bank netbanking allows its banking customers to use its internet banking application for online purchases.
Krungsri netbanking allows its banking customers to use its internet banking application for online purchases.

Banco Pastor in Spain enables its customers to pay for goods and services bought over the internet using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
Jyske Bank enables their customers to use online banking to complete online purchases. Consumers are redirected to their trusted bank environment to initiate a bank transfer.
VÚB Banka in Slovakia enables its banking clients to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
Älandsbanken enables their customers to use online banking to complete online purchases. Consumers are redirected to their trusted bank environment to initiate a bank transfer.

ING Bank enables its customers to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Consumers use their trusted home banking environment, merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
UniCredit enables its online shoppers to pay for goods and services using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
iDEAL is a standardised payment method for making secure online payments directly between bank accounts in The Netherlands.
The KasikornThai or Kbank net banking service allows its customers to pay online from their internet banking application.
ICICI netbanking in India allows its bank customers to use the bank's home banking to pay for online purchases.
Volksbank enables its online shoppers to pay for goods and services using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
MoneyMail allows Russian shoppers to send their money through their nationwide bank network. MoneyMail users can pay by making bank deposits by using several payment systems, card and cash payments.

La Caixa in Spain enables its customers to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Consumers use their trusted home banking environment, merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
GE Money enables its online shoppers to pay for goods and services using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
S-Pankki enables their customers to use online banking to complete their internet purchases. Consumers are redirected to their trusted bank environment to initiate an online bank transfer.
mBank (mTransfer) enables its banking clients to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
ProvinciaPagos is the online banking service of the Grupo Provincia in Argentina. ProvinciaPagos allows online shoppers to use their online banking system to complete their online purchases.
Trustly makes paying directly from your online bank account as fast, simple and secure as sliding cash across the counter.
The HDFC Bank's online banking (netbanking) service allows its customers to pay online from their home banking application.

The SEPA Credit Transfer (SCT) allows consumers to pay for their goods and services by using their euro bank account to transfer money directly to the merchants' bank account. Both the consumer and merchant should be domiciled within the SEPA (eurozone) region.

Wire transfer or credit transfer is a method of electronic funds transfer from one person or institution (entity) to another. A wire transfer can be made from one bank account to another bank account or through a transfer of cash at a cash office.
With ING's Home'Pay you do not even need a credit card to pay for your online purchases. Just pay via the secured Home'Bank connection!
Erste Bank enables its online shoppers to pay for goods and services using online bank transfers as payment method. Merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.

Inteligo Bank (Poland) enables its customers to shop online using online bank transfers as payment method. Consumers use their trusted home banking environment, merchants benefit from payment guarantee and swift settlement.
